name: Jurassic Smash!
description:
In this 2D-Platformer you play as a fire-breathing Tyrannosaurus Rex, on a quest to survive & hunt against the humans who are trying to drive your species to extinction!  Fight various enemies along with cavemen trying to hunt you down and collect rare gems along the way as you travel across a dream-like land of adventure full of action-packed combat!

Controls (Keyboard)

A – Move Forward

D – Move Backward

Shift - Sprint

Spacebar – Jump!

F – Fireball Attack
